sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Grid, Card, CardActionArea, CardMedia, CardContent, Typography } from '@mui/material';

// Define the reusable component with props
function AdminCards({ imageUrl, title, description }) {
  return (
    <Grid item xs={12} sm={6} md={4} lg={3}>
      <Card style={{ backgroundColor: '#424242' }}>
        <CardActionArea>
          <CardMedia
            component="img"
            height="140"
            image={imageUrl} // Use imageUrl prop
            alt="Abstract Image"
          />
          <CardContent>
            <Typography gutterBottom variant="h5" component="div" style={{ color: 'white' }}>
              {title} // Use title prop
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" style={{ color: 'grey' }}>
              {description} // Use description prop
            </Typography>
          </CardContent>
        </CardActionArea>
      </Card>
    </Grid>
  );
}

export default AdminCards;
